title: ONE PIECE BURNING BLOOD
notes: I runs just like the Windows, except the character models are corrupted on the selection screen, and in battle they are invisible.

Characters won't render correctly, they are invisible in battles and a polygon mess in the character selection screen. My XBox One controller stoped working for this game on proton recently. It worked fine the first days.

title: One Piece Burning Blood

notes: Any video will crash the game, don't matter if you launch the story mode or if you try to see them at collection section. Characters appear broken on character selection screen and won't appear at all at fights. XBox One controller works fine and online features seem to work (couldn't find people playing but you can see rankings and that stuff).
